Articles.Content:
Is there a setting I'm missing to have the little utility vehicles roaming around my design & assembly buildings? I see them in folks' videos but I don't seem to have them as part of my game.

KSP 1.0.4.861 from Steam

DxDiag - https://www.dropbox.com/s/mpkx1t0wy5k2o9w/DxDiag.txt?dl=0
Yes actually, you can find it on the first settings screen as "Show space center crew"

Yes actually, you can find it on the first settings screen as "Show space center crew"

Just checked, I do have that enabled. There's ground crew with tools and clipboards and other gadgets, but no vehicles roaming around.

Okay, please verify the games cache in Steam first to make sure all files are installed, see here for info.

Even if KSP is fine it'll replace two files anyway, but if it finds more than two then something was corrupt.

Check for vehicles again, in the VAB they are only outside the VAB door, you'll see more in the SPH (if they work).

If they aren't there after the cache verification please find your output_log.txt in the GameData folder, see here for opening the KSP folder via Steam, and upload it to a file share site or dropbox.

Post the URL here and I'll see if there's anything in the log.
It doesn't show anything wrong, okay can you upload your settings.cfg please, it's in the KSP folder.

Nothing wrong there either except FALLBACK_PART_SHADERS = True, this should only be used on old gfx cards, yours is new enough not to need this enabled, and it doesn't affect the vehicles anyway.

Just so I'm clear on this, you are missing vehicles inside and viewable through the doors of the VAB and SPH? And you're not talking about vehicles in the KSC scene before clicking on a building, or vehicles around the buildings when in the flight scene (after launching a craft)? As there aren't any in stock KSP.

And you're checking in Sandbox and Science modes, or a fully upgraded Career VAB/SPH? Because the tier 1 and tier 2 buildings don't have vehicles.

This is what you should see, from tier 3 to tier 1, vehicles are only in tier 3.

If you're missing vehicles in tier 3 I'm sorry but I have no idea why, it's never come up before so I don't even know a cause let alone a fix, all I can suggest is you completely delete KSP and reinstall it.

Derp.

or a fully upgraded Career VAB/SPH? Because the tier 1 and tier 2 buildings don't have vehicles.

I'm just gonna wander off quietly now...
